column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of a human head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, of sagittal section. We observe slice n°160 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5129.7363 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5576.6602 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 73.8281 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 18.4570 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 238.6230 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1539.8438 mm³, the right putamen of volume 73.8281 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 187.2070 mm³ and the right amygdala of volume 2.6367 mm³.
